alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Henry, northwestern Clay and southwestern Quitman Counties through 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/... At 631 PM EDT/531 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Georgetown, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Coates, Wire Bridge, Bagby State Park, Bonapartes Retreat, Standleys Store, Thomas Mill Creek, Double Bridges, Ricks Place and Scottsboro Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
